lead_paragraph: Alisports, the sports arm of e-commerce giant Alibaba, is to invest $100 million (81.88 million pound) in Chinese rugby over the next 10 years as part of an initiative to make the world's most populous nation a force in the game, World Rugby said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Chinese Rugby to Get $100 Million, Recruit One Million Players
headline.main: Chinese Rugby to Get $100 Million, Recruit One Million Players
